reviewText: Not too bad at all, unfortunately the video quality isn't the best because of it most likely being on  film and not digital... Otherwise not bad at a
Received item quickly. Bob Ross's technique is simple, yet amazing.
Prompt service and good merchandise. Thanks

This was a present for my wife who has always had trouble painting roses. She watched the video and with a few starts and stops can now paint roses that look real. Other techniques picked up make her backgrounds better as well. The video is easy to follow and I can reccomend this to anyone who wants to learn.

I found this DVD which has been reproduced from VHS; to be of poor quality. The beginning of the actual painting project was so bright and you could not see what she was doing and it actually gave me a migraine headache trying to watch it. I personally, would not recommend it to anyone. Both the Floral DVDs with Bob Ross and Annette Kowalski have problems. I have several of the Bob Ross DVD collections (some from Amazon.com) which are great; just that the Floral ones have problems, as far as, I know. Happy Painting.
